Class Board

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Board. 1 quadratic board with queens

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int n)
        Instantiates a new board.
        Parameters:
        n - The size of the board n*n

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        The size of the board n*n

      • generateQueens

        public void generateQueens()
        Populate Board with random Queens. No Queen can be in the same row or column than another queen!

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the board in the Console.

      • fitness

        public int fitness()
        The Fitness of the board. Lower is better! 0 is the solution of the Problem
        Returns:
        the Fitness

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • setQueen

        public void setQueen(int i,
            byte val)
        Sets one queen at a position
        Parameters:
        i - The Index of the Queen (Y-Coordinate)
        val - The Value to set (X-Coordinate)

      • getQueen

        public byte getQueen(int i)
        Returns the Value in the Queen Array. Y-Coordinate gives back X-Coordinate
        Parameters:
        i - The Index to return (Y-Coordinate)
        Returns:
        The Value of the specific Index (X-Coordinate)

      • repairBoard

        public void repairBoard()
        Repairs the board. Resolves worng values in the Array (Only one Queen per Row and Collumn!)
